awd_titl_txt: Fundamental Aspects of the Behavior of Saturated Soils UnderUndrained Cyclic Loads
awd_abstract_narration: Available data indicate that the mechanism of the response of any               soil microstructure to loads has the same key components, and that              different cyclic response in different soils is obtained mainly                 because in each type of soil some of the components are more                    dominant than the others.  Consequently, cyclic characteristics of              different soils can be linked together and uniquely explained via               these microstructural mechanisms, making soil dynamics a more                   rigorous and systematic discipline.  At present, no such link is                avialable, and cohesionless and cohesive soils are studied                      separately using differnt cyclic characterization of different                  soils and cyclic soil classification will be developed based on the             understanding of the behavior of soil microstructure.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
